cards.description: [ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Deal 10 damage to each enemy Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is sent to the Grave: Draw 1 card.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 20 damage to a Champion and Return this card to your Hand.
[ACTIVATED] Deal 20 damage to a Champion then Destroy this card. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Add 1 copy of 'Crimson Cataclysm' from your Deck to your Hand.
[TRIGGER] If this card is discarded or destroyed: Deal 10 damage to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] If this card is discarded: Heal 10 damage from a Champion. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[TRIGGER] If this card is Discarded or Destroyed: you can Destroy 1 Air Equipment you control then Draw 2 cards.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy this card then Add 1 'Tidal Wave' from Grave to Hand. [TRIGGER] If this card is destroyed: Deal 20 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Return 1 'Vital Bloom' from your Field to your Hand then Deal 10 damage to this Champion and 30 damage to a Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Return 1 'Withering Thorns' from your Field to your Hand then Heal 20 damage from this Champion.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy 1 'Catalyst Orb' you control then Heal 20 damage from the Champion that was equipped with that 'Catalyst Orb'.
[ACTIVATED] Destroy all 'Grenade's you control and Deal 30 damage to a Champion for each 'Grenade' destroyed.
[ACTIVATED] If you control another 'Accelerating Particle': Destroy all Equipment on the Field. [PASSIVE] This card may be equipped to any Equipment Slot.
